thread.title: You Can Tell Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Are Seriously in Love by the Way They Dress
thread.title_full: You Can Tell Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Are Seriously in Love by the Way They Dress

author: Marina Liao
title: You Can Tell Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Are Seriously in Love by the Way They Dress
text:
Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Couple Style You Can Tell Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Are Seriously in Love by the Way They Dress March 16, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 You Can Tell Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas Are Seriously in Love by the Way They Dress 
It's a sure sign that when couples dress start dressing alike they're serious about each other. The celebrity pair that comes to mind? Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas . The Games of Thrones star and musician were linked in November and since then have gone to weddings and even Paris together. 
Their couple style is going just as strong, too. Both stars have an affinity for basics like tees and jeans, but where they shine the most is outerwear. You can usually spot Sophie or Joe wearing a bomber or denim jacket — sometimes at the same time. The couple also sticks to reds, blues, and blacks, which proves their closets are way more similar than you would expect. Keep reading to see how Sophie and Joe have coordinated so far, because there will likely be more looks to come. Then check out all the times Zayn and Gigi Hadid matched . Related:
